channel.title: Molly Shannon on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Molly Shannon Boards Will Ferrell’s Netflix Golf Comedy, Ramy Youssef Exits
item.description: Youssef and Josh Rabinowitz were listed as co-creators with Ferrell but have left the series over creative differences.
